answers.answer: My 3rd was induced (at 41 weeks), compared to my first 2 (13 hours in labor each) it took half the time (6 hours from start to finish) and just as wonderful an experience as the others
Thanks valerie i am trusting in God that this will be an easy experience :-)
Thanks valerie i am trusting in God that this will be an easy experience :-)
Are you being induced for Gestational Diabetes?
My dog jumped on my stomach while I was laying down,  I'm 11 weeks along should I be concerned?
Yes stevie as i have gestational diabetis i will be induced at 39 weeks they said placenta started to deteriorate after that week when you have gd

Oh wow! I didn't know that. I knew they liked to induce whenever diabetes is involved, but didn't know that about the placenta. I have GD too. I may end up needing to use insulin to control it as well, so I know I will be getting induced. Good luck on Friday though!! :)

question: I am having induction because of gd on friday, i had heard horrible stories about that but i do not have a choice. I wonder if there is something i could do to get a successful experience. I was wonder if I could be sitting while induction and that can increase my chances. Any advice or successful stories are really appreciated. Also prayers are welcome :-) I am 38 weeks and 5 days my induction is at 39 weeks.
title: Advice for a successful medical induction?
